Prelim Questions.question: It is considered to be the greatest information system.
The ability to open new Web pages by clicking text links on a Web browser.
A type of Web resource that is produced on the fly.
A type of Web resource that already exists in a Web server.
A program that uses HTTP  to serve the files that form Web pages to users, in response to their requests, which are forwarded by their computers' HTTP clients.
This application crawls the web and harvests information.
They are the typical devices that uses the Web.
Data that is chopped into smaller pieces
Computers that store web pages and websites.
He was the one who invented The World Wide Web.
Methods GET, HEAD, and POST are now supported. Content-Type Header was added. -- a. HTTP 0.9 -- b. HTTP 1.0 -- c. HTTP 1.1 -- d. HTTP 2.0
The Upgrade header was introduced. Also, HTTP pipelining was implemented.
It only supports GET method and its response type is only hypertext. -- a. HTTP 0.9 -- b. HTTP 1.0 -- c. HTTP 1.1 -- d. HTTP 2.0

Aside from the methods GET, HEAD, and POST, the methods PUT, DELETE, TRACE, and OPTIONS are now supported. The Keep-Alive header first used. -- a. HTTP 0.9 -- b. HTTP 1.0 -- c. HTTP 1.1 -- d. HTTP 2.0
This version supports Query Multiplexing and Headers Compression. -- a. HTTP 0.9 -- b. HTTP 1.0 -- c. HTTP 1.1 -- d. HTTP 2.0
True or False: Continue -- HTTP Status: Informational
True or False: OK -- HTTP Status: Success
True or False: Found -- HTTP Status: Success
True or False: Created -- HTTP Status: Informational
True or False: Processing -- HTTP Status: Redirection
True or False: Internal Server Error -- HTTP Status: Server Error
True or False: Misdirected Request -- HTTP Status: Client Error
True or False: Already Reported -- HTTP Status: Informational
True or False: Use Proxy -- HTTP Status: Redirection
True or False: Forbidden -- HTTP Status: Server Error
HTML means Hypertext _____ Language
The X in XHTML means _____
WHATWG means Web Hypertext Application _____ Working Group
_____ opposed in continuing the XHTML.
HTML _____ is a language that allows you to write in HTML and converts that into another language.

Midterm Questions.question: Generates CSS using a custom language syntax that typically includes features that dont exist in pure CSS.
Provides pre-defined CSS design functionality that can be reused, excluded, or customized.
Provide features that developers expect browsers to provide natively.
A language that is independent of HTML that allows developers to edit the presentation of attributes, layouts, and other HTML elements in a Web page.
Who developed CSS along with Bert Bros?
A type of CSS style that is written directly in the HTML file.
It is the source of styles for HTML language
A type of CSS style that is written directly in the HTML file but it is embedded in the head of the document.
A weight that is applied to a given CSS declaration, determined by the number of each selector type in the matching selector.
A type of CSS style that is written in a separate document and then it was attached to different web documents.

I checked to make sure that he was still alive.

-- _____: green;

This sentence is 20 px large.

? -- _____:20px;

They got there early, and they got really good seats.

-- _____: dotted;

Abstraction is often one floor above you.

-- _____: line-through;

Winter is coming.

-- _____: 2px 2px red;
This CSS level added properties for positioning that allowed CSS to be used for page layout. -- a. CSS Level 1 -- b. CSS Level 2 -- c. CSS Level 3
This level allows you to effectively build presentations from Web documents. -- a. CSS Level 1 -- b. CSS Level 2 -- c. CSS Level 3
This level of CSS specifications is considered by the CSS WG to be obsolete. -- a. CSS Level 1 -- b. CSS Level 2 -- c. CSS Level 3
This level is divided into several modules. -- a. CSS Level 1 -- b. CSS Level 2 -- c. CSS Level 3
The CSS level that lacks dependable web browser support. -- a. CSS Level 1 -- b. CSS Level 2 -- c. CSS Level 3
True or False: JavaScript is a program that runs on a browser environment.
True or False: In the past, JavaScript will execute first on the bottom.
True or False: To fetch a JS, href is used instead of src
True or False: A top-level code is executed as the script is loaded.
True or False: JS code that are inside functions are executed when the function is invoked.
True or False: Ekma Script is the standardized version of JavaScript.
True or False: In JavaScript, BOM stands for Browser Object Modifier.
True or False: DOM is the most important API
True or False: In JavaScript, DOM stands for Document Object Model.
